This file documents the recent AI-assisted improvements made to the Sora project.
- Refactored code to improve readability and maintainability.
- Used assertions where applicable to enforce expected behavior.
- Simplified control flow and removed redundant code.
- Added **Javadoc comments** to all public classes and methods.
- Ensures future developers can understand and use the code easily.
These changes aim to make the Sora codebase more robust, readable, and easier to maintain.
Sora is a simple task management chatbot that helps you keep track of your todos, deadlines, afters and events through a friendly CLI or GUI interface.
- Java 17 or above installed on your machine.
4. A GUI window will open, and you can start typing commands.
event TASK_DESCRIPTION /from dd/mm/yyyy HHmm /to dd/mm/yyyy HHmm
What can I do for you today?
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 1 task in the list.
Here are the tasks in your list:
Bye. Hope to see you again soon!
* The {@code Parser} class handles the parsing and execution of user commands.
* It interprets user input and modifies the {@code TaskList} accordingly.
* Parses and executes the given user command.
* @param command the raw user input string.
* @param tasks the current {@code TaskList} to modify.
* @param ui the {@code Ui} instance to handle interactions.
* @param storage the {@code Storage} used for saving/loading tasks.
* @throws SoraException if the command is invalid or malformed.
public static String parse(String command, TaskList tasks, Ui ui,
assert command != null : "Command must not be null";
assert tasks != null : "TaskList must not be null";
assert ui != null : "Ui must not be null";
assert storage != null : "Storage must not be null";
throw new SoraException("Not a valid input");
throw new SoraException("Lack of deadline time!");
throw new SoraException("Lack of required time!");
throw new SoraException("Lack of start time!");
throw new SoraException("Lack of end time!");

* the command is delegated to the {@link Parser#parse(String, TaskList, Ui, Storage)}
* method to perform the required task operations.
* @param command the command input from the user
* @throws SoraException if the command is invalid or an error occurs during execution
